Profile: I'm a 2nd year computer engineering student at Institut International de Technologie (IIT), motivated, serious, rigorous, dynamic and with a strong team spirit. I'm passionate about Artificial Intelligence, Deep Learning, Machine Learning, Cloud Computing, DevOps and new technologies.

IDE: Entreprise Architect, Eclipse, Git / VS Code, Power BI, MongoBD, Laragon, SQL Server, Android studio.
